nodes.text: The B1 battle droid dispenser was a roughly cylindrical box made of durasteel used by the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars to continually dispense a supply of B1-Series battle droids, from three circular hatches mounted at equidistant points around the dispenser. The droids were stored in deactivated, folded position, much like in the MTT, but it is unknown exactly how many droids the dispensers contained. The clone commandos of Delta Squad encountered many of these units during their various operations.
In game, the droid dispensers will continue deploying droids until the dispenser itself is destroyed. It is likely that this is simply game mechanics.
